attributes.action: save East of Englamd Ambulamce Service
attributes.additional_details:
Save the East of England Ambulance service from cuts in Ambulances and detrimental changes to the way in which our service is delivered to us. Instead improve the service that we hold so dear and give the recourses that are needed so that we can have the service required in the East of England.
We want the Department of Health to ensure that we have the staff and the correct vehicles to ensure that we are all have the right treatment and not to be left for hours with no help at all.

rejection.details: Please see: Save your community Ambulance Station
